snippet.title: Goetz - Trailer
snippet.description:
Götz is a narratively driven, picture book style illustrated puzzle game. Dive into a faithfully designed medieval universe and immerse in a lovely story about overcoming self doubt and finding ones place in a changing world. Join knight Götz and his friends on their fantastic journey across the land. Solve tricky puzzles and be rewarded with fully voiced and visualized narrative pieces that drive the story forward.

Get Goetz:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3391930/Gtz/

#goetzgame #sleepyseedgames #games #gaming #videogames #art #artwork #conceptart #steam
